title: Inside Cara Delevingne’s raucous Nasty Gal launch party at The Box
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Cara Delevingne pulled out all the stops as she launched her Nasty Gal collaboration in style, with a raucous night at The Box.

The 27-year-old looked incredible for the night, opting for a tailored grey checked blazer with matching trousers.

She finished the outfit off with a plain white crop top, and plain black heels.

The model was joined by a string of her famous friends as she partied the night away in Soho, including girlfriend Ashley Benson, Nick Grimshaw, Daisy Lowe and Lottie Moss.

At one point, Grimmy found himself in the DJ booth as he hopped on the decks as the bash.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The former X Factor judge looked a total natural as he span tracks, while pal Daisy Lowe seemed to have a fabulous time dancing behind him.

Cara rocked a matching checked blazer and trousers for the bash (Picture: Backgrid)

Nick Grimshaw got up on the decks like a pro (Picture: Getty)

Daisy Lowe definitely still has those Strictly Come Dancing moves (Picture: Getty)

Side note: She’s definitely still got those Strictly Come Dancing moves.

Despite it being Cara’s big night, an insider revealed she ‘didn’t leave’ Ashley’s side all night, packing on all the PDA with the Pretty Little Liars actress.

After they were seen having a quick kiss in the DJ booth, a source told Metro.co.uk: ‘Cara didn’t leave Ashley’s side even though it was her night.

‘She made sure Ashley was with her the whole time.

Ashley Benson was a total proud girlfriend on the night (Picture: Getty)

Lottie Moss joined the bash (Picture: Getty)

Ella Eyre and Vanessa White also partied with the model (Picture: Getty)

‘They seem totally loved up, they only have eyes for each other.’

But the supermodel managed to tear herself away from the dancefloor to share a video by a fish tank, to promote her upcoming collaboration, which launches on 23 October.

‘Hey guys I’m here with my friends celebrating at The Box for the new Nasty Gal collection that is coming out tomorrow,’ she told her 43.5million followers.

‘Check it out and I will see you there.’

Lottie Tomlinson looked chic as she got involved with the celebrations (Picture: Getty)

Cara’s Nasty Gal collaboration comes out on 23 October (Picture: Getty)

Cara and Ashley kept their heads down as they left the party (Picture: Backgrid)

While we’re not sure entirely what relevance the fish tank has, we’re still into it.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Cara’s 40-piece range – yes, 40 different outfits – comes complete with leopard print, faux fur coats, slogan t-shirts and silk skirts.

And we want every single piece.

Speaking about the collection, she said: ‘I am so excited to get to join Nasty Gal in this new part of their brand journey.

‘It’s such an exciting time to be working with them.

‘It’s empowering to select pieces of clothing to illustrate how you feel on the inside on any given day.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: Logan Paul channels inner Rocky as he gets ripped for KSI rematch
description: Cara Delevingne pulled out all the stops as she launched her Nasty Gal collaboration in style, with a raucous night at The Box
